Notes: A lava geyser that periodically appears and disappear. It damages the player and compatible objects upon contact. In SMG2, it can be frozen by the Orange Luma.

Obj_arg0.Name: Rising Delay
Obj_arg0.Description: The delay until it starts rising up again. Default is 180.

Obj_arg1.Name: Rising Time
Obj_arg1.Description: How long it stays visible before disappearing again. Default is 180.

SW_A.Description: If used, the object will only appear while this switch is activated.

SW_B.Description: If activated, the geyser will disappear forever.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.
